thread.title: John Calipari ditches SEC Network interview as Mizzou fans chant 'Cal you suck'
thread.title_full: John Calipari ditches SEC Network interview as Mizzou fans chant 'Cal you suck'

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: John Calipari ditches SEC Network interview as Mizzou fans chant 'Cal you suck'
text:
February 22, 2017 8:36am EST February 22, 2017 8:36am EST Missouri fans successfully annoyed John Calipari during their game against the No. 11 Wildcats on Tuesday night. John Calipari (Getty Images) 
Updated at 8:36 a.m. ET 
Updated at 8:36 a.m. ET 
Missouri fans successfully annoyed John Calipari during their game against the No. 11 Wildcats on Tuesday night. 
As the Kentucky head coach was doing a halftime interview with SEC Networkâ€™s Laura Rutledge, the Mizzou Arena crowd provided a very loud "Cal you suck!" chant. 
When Rutledge asked Calipari for his thoughts on the rowdy student section, the coach abruptly walked away from the interview. Best halftime interview of the season pic.twitter.com/KXuwMkU3TS
